markdown:
Benevolent genies from the Plane of Air, djinn value art, culture, knowledge, and trade. They also love new experiences, succulent dishes, and heady wines. Of all geniekind, they are most likely to approach humans and other mortals, interacting with them on friendly terms. Still, djinn are proud of their genie heritage and have a tendency to be patronizing toward mortals, a habit that has earned them a reputation for arrogance.
Djinn get along with jann and marids, but they find shaitans too stiff and harbor undying hatred for efreet. All squares in the djinni’s aura are difficult terrain for Striding and Flying creatures. Creatures with the air trait are immune. --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 40 feet **Melee** scimitar +15 ([forceful +1](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)), **Damage** 1d6+10 slashing **Melee** fist +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 1d4+10 bludgeoning **Ranged** crashing wind +15 ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [range increment 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)), **Damage** 1d8+6 bludgeoning **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 23 - **2nd** [Enhance Victuals](/Spells.aspx?ID=101) (at will), [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only) - **3rd** [Illusory Creature](/Spells.aspx?ID=158), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160) - **4th** [Creation](/Spells.aspx?ID=54), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (at will; to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane only) - **Constant (3rd)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) **Hurricane Blast** ([Air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) **Frequency** Once per round. **Effect** The djinni all creatures in its whirlwind pushes back 20 feet, or forces all creatures in the aura to move 20 feet clockwise or counterclockwise. Each creature must attempt a DC 21 Fortitude save. On a success, it avoids being moved, and on a critical failure it falls [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) in addition to being moved. Creatures with the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) trait are immune.
Djinni Viziers Djinni viziers prefer to manifest wishes in physical, often gaudy displays, but cut corners in quality. Wished-for gold, for example, might only be gold plated (and still valuable), not solid gold. Djinni viziers add the following to their innate spells: **5th** [_summon giants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=324), [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340).
